select di.id, di.code, di.name, di.type_id, di.online_flag, di.create_date, di.open_flag, di.device_value, di.remark, dt.name as typeName, dt.images, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages from device_info di left join device_type dt on (dt.id = di.type_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = di.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{deviceHistoryInfo.name},'%')
AND dt.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{deviceHistoryInfo.typeName},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{deviceHistoryInfo.userName},'%')
AND di.online_flag = #{deviceHistoryInfo.onlineFlag}
order by di.create_date desc
